title: Horror Drones: 20 Loopable Scary Ambiences
description: Dare to let "Horror Drones: 20 Loopable Scary Ambiences" be the haunting soundtrack to your terrifying adventures.
longDescription:
Step into the realm of terror with "Horror Drones: 20 Loopable Scary Ambiences," a meticulously crafted audio asset pack designed to send shivers down your spine. Immerse yourself in 1-minute-long, loopable drone sounds, each meticulously composed to create a bone-chilling atmosphere for your horror-themed video games.


Listen to the Demo here.


Tracklist:

  1. Abyssal Descent Loop
  2. Chilling Omen Loop
  3. Creeping Terrors Loop
  4. Cursed Atmosphere Loop
  5. Cursed Spectral Hues Loop
  6. Darkened Whispers Loop
  7. Deadly Shadows Loop
  8. Eerie Resonance Loop
  9. Ephemeral Echo Loop
  10. Forbidden Lament Loop
  11. Ghostly Reverberations Loop
  12. Haunting Grounds Loop
  13. Lurking Dread Loop
  14. Malevolent Aura Loop
  15. Otherworldly Resurgence Loop
  16. Paranormal Infusion Loop
  17. Scary Vortex Loop
  18. Sinister Specters Loop
  19. Spectral Wail Loop
  20. Unearthly Tremors Loop


I value your feedback:

Your thoughts matter! Whether it's a review, suggestions, or direct contact, I appreciate your input. Interact with me, and let's shape the fear together.


Contact:

For custom requests or further queries, feel free to reach out via email: hello@markthechef.net or check my socials on Instagram and Youtube.

Dare to let "Horror Drones: 20 Loopable Scary Ambiences" be the haunting soundtrack to your terrifying adventures.
technicalDetails:
Technical Details:

  • Features: 20 Original Loopable Drones
  • Ideal for Horror or Thriller Games
  • Number of Audio Wavs: 20
  • Number of Audio Cues: 20
  • Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 bit
  • Does music loop: Yes
  • Minutes of audio provided: 20 minutes (20 tracks x 1 minute each)
  • Supported Development Platforms:Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
